availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Archer S. Waugh (Nicholas County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda J. Waugh. Father of William H. Waugh, James H. Waugh, Nancy C. Waugh, Samuel M. Waugh, Susan M. Waugh, Walter W. Waugh, and Mary V. Waugh. Owned four enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1860. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 401B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 361
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 291
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, p. 139A
